title: Simple Exploration+Baseline - GA Customer Revenue
description: Objective of the notebook: In this notebook, let us explore the given dataset and make some inferences along the way. Also finally we will build a baseline light gbm model to get started. Objective of the competition: In this competition, we a’re challenged to analyze a Google Merchandise Store (also known as GStore, where Google swag is sold) customer dataset to predict revenue per customer.
